name: Edition 5/22 tarot card - The Emperor
description:
Size: 2362 x 4725 px
This edition card will be released every Friday.

Bow your head, you will face The Emperor! He was a rich, stable, and solid man. Even though he can be stiff and stubborn at times, he has the power to protect you. Join his kingdom if you like to be in charge.

As the absolute ruler of the world, The Emperor is sitting on a ram-adorned throne made out of stone. There are 4 ram heads carved on his throne, which symbolizes a completely masculine sign. Meanwhile, the stone represents his authority. He is holding a scepter in his right hand with a symbol of Ankh on it; the Egyptian symbol of life. In his left hand, there is a globe that shows his power and domination. The red color of his clothes represents passion, while his white hair bearing the symbol of wisdom. One more thing, the crown on his head. It shows his success.

The Emperor is the fourth trump in Major Arcana and… you know what? 4 is the number of structures and stability.

*This item is available only as a Non-Fungible Token (NFT). It’s strictly prohibited to steal and reduplicate this NFT item.
